cards.title: Intro
cards.body: The SQL cheat sheet provides you with the most commonly used SQL statements for your reference.

cards.title: Connect MySQL
cards.code:
mysql -u <user> -p

mysql [db_name]

mysql -h <host> -P <port> -u <user> -p [db_name]

mysql -h <host> -u <user> -p [db_name]

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: Create a backup

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: mysqldump -u user -p db_name > db.sql

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: Export db without schema

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
```{.wrap}
mysqldump -u user -p db_name --no-data=true --add-drop-table=false > db.sql

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Restore a backup

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: mysql -u user -p db_name < db.sql

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
## MySQL Examples

### Managing tables

Create a new table with three columns

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Delete the table from the database

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: DROP TABLE t ;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Add a new column to the table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: ALTER TABLE t ADD column;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Drop column c from the table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: ALTER TABLE t DROP COLUMN c ;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Add a constraint

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: ALTER TABLE t ADD constraint;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Drop a constraint

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: ALTER TABLE t DROP constraint;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Rename a table from t1 to t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: ALTER TABLE t1 RENAME TO t2;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Rename column c1 to c2

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: ALTER TABLE t1 RENAME c1 TO c2 ;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Remove all data in a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: TRUNCATE TABLE t;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
### Querying data from a table

Query data in columns c1, c2 from a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: SELECT c1, c2 FROM t

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Query all rows and columns from a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: SELECT * FROM t

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Query data and filter rows with a condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Query distinct rows from a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT DISTINCT c1 FROM t
WHERE condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Sort the result set in ascending or descending order

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
ORDER BY c1 ASC [DESC]

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Skip offset of rows and return the next n rows

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
ORDER BY c1
LIMIT n OFFSET offset

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Group rows using an aggregate function

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, aggregate(c2)
FROM t
GROUP BY c1

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Filter groups using HAVING clause

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, aggregate(c2)
FROM t
GROUP BY c1
HAVING condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
### Querying from multiple tables {.row-span-2}

Inner join t1 and t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1
INNER JOIN t2 ON condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Left join t1 and t1

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1
LEFT JOIN t2 ON condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Right join t1 and t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1
RIGHT JOIN t2 ON condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Perform full outer join

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1
FULL OUTER JOIN t2 ON condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Produce a Cartesian product of rows in tables

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1
CROSS JOIN t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Another way to perform cross join

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1, t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Join t1 to itself using INNER JOIN clause

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t1 A
INNER JOIN t1 B ON condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Using SQL Operators Combine rows from two queries

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1
UNION [ALL]
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Return the intersection of two queries

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1
INTERSECT
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Subtract a result set from another result set

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1
MINUS
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t2

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Query rows using pattern matching %, \_

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t1
WHERE c1 [NOT] LIKE pattern

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Query rows in a list

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE c1 [NOT] IN value_list

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Query rows between two values

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE  c1 BETWEEN low AND high

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Check if values in a table is NULL or not

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
SELECT c1, c2 FROM t
WHERE  c1 IS [NOT] NULL

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
### Using SQL constraints

Set c1 and c2 as a primary key

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Set c2 column as a foreign key

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Make the values in c1 and c2 unique

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Ensure c1 > 0 and values in c1 >= c2

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Set values in c2 column not NULL

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code:
### Modifying Data

Insert one row into a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
INSERT INTO t(column_list)
VALUES(value_list);

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Insert multiple rows into a table

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Insert rows from t2 into t1

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Update new value in the column c1 for all rows

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
UPDATE t
SET c1 = new_value;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Update values in the column c1, c2 that match the condition

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
UPDATE t
SET c1 = new_value,
c2 = new_value
WHERE condition;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Delete all data in a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: DELETE FROM t;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Delete subset of rows in a table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
DELETE FROM t
WHERE condition;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
### Managing Views

Create a new view that consists of c1 and c2

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
CREATE VIEW v(c1,c2)
AS
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Create a new view with check option

cards.title: Backups
Backups
cards.code: Create a recursive view

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
CREATE RECURSIVE VIEW v
AS
select-statement -- anchor part
UNION [ALL]
select-statement; -- recursive part

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Create a temporary view

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW v
AS
SELECT c1, c2
FROM t;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Delete a view

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: DROP VIEW view_name;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
### Managing triggers

Create or modify a trigger

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
CREATE OR MODIFY TRIGGER trigger_name
WHEN EVENT
ON table_name TRIGGER_TYPE
EXECUTE stored_procedure;

cards.title: Backups
cards.code:
#### WHEN

| -        | -                              |
| -------- | ------------------------------ |
| `BEFORE` | invoke before the event occurs |
| `AFTER`  | invoke after the event occurs  |

#### EVENT

| -        | -                 |
| -------- | ----------------- |
| `INSERT` | invoke for INSERT |
| `UPDATE` | invoke for UPDATE |
| `DELETE` | invoke for DELETE |

#### TRIGGER_TYPE

| -                    | -   |
| -------------------- | --- |
| `FOR EACH ROW`       |     |
| `FOR EACH STATEMENT` |     |

### Managing indexes

Create an index on c1 and c2 of the t table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
CREATE INDEX idx_name
ON t(c1,c2);

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Create a unique index on c3, c4 of the t table

cards.title: Backups
cards.body:
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_name
ON t(c3,c4)

cards.title: Backups
cards.code: Drop an index

cards.title: Backups
cards.body: DROP INDEX idx_name ON t;

cards.title: Backups
